item.title: Exif Image Viewer
item.description: In this project the goal is to have an image viewer and for each image to have the possibility to extract the exif data. Images can also be rotated clockwise or counterclockwise. Furthermore, if an image contains exif data relating to GPS information, it can be geolocated on Google Maps. If you want to see the GitHub project click on the icon below:
